data.name: DFFNT: 3rd Appearance Special Set for Terra & Kefka
data.detailed_description:
Allows Terra Branford and Kefka Palazzo to equip the following items.

* Terra Branford
- The Espers' Progeny I (Appearance)
- The Espers' Progeny II (Appearance)
- The Espers' Progeny III (Appearance)
- Ultima Weapon (Weapon)
- Additional Chat Messages

* Kefka Palazzo
- Fallen One I (Appearance)
- Fallen One II (Appearance)
- Fallen One III (Appearance)
- Courtly Headdress (Weapon)
- Additional Chat Messages

*You must first download DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition, Standard Edition or Deluxe Edition (available to purchase separately) before you can use this content.
*If you are playing DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition, you must first purchase the Terra Branford and Kefka Palazzo Starter Packs before you can use this content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2550 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 460 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 1280x720 Low settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 470 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 1920x1080 High settings
